sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you're showing me your "<radical>spirit</radical> <radical>fruit</radical>" then you are just <kanji>naked</kanji>. You're <kanji>nude</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You know what I mean by "spirit fruit" –– yep, it's out there and you're naked.
readingMnemonic: Known for being <kanji>naked</kanji> (and showing you his spirit fruit) is the ancient Egyptian god <reading>Ra</reading> (<ja>ら</ja>).
readingInfo: Don't look up "Ra Egyptian god naked" in Google. Nothing good will come of it. Instead, just imagine your own Egyptian god Ra being naked in front of you.
